findings.title: Improper Reset of Claimable Amount
findings.description: The amount of the user's currently claimable $THO will be reset to zero, regardless of the duration passed since the previous deposit, causing monetary loss for the user and reputation damage to the platform.

findings.title: Centralized Control of State Variables
findings.description: The controlling authority can change critical state variables to gain additional profit, which is unfair to users.
